translations: 以发球赢对手一分；（高尔夫球）在上一杆进洞；得优，在……中取得好成绩（ace 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 血管紧张素转化酶抑制剂

sentences.sentence: And ended up acing the test!
The professional English course is just English for acing.
sentences.translation: 我的专业英语就是会计英语。 。

sentences.sentence: Now comes another challenging part, which is acing your interview to actually GET the job!
sentences.translation: 那么接下来是另一个挑战，如何通过这次面试获得工作机会！
